DESCRIPTION: Activate the effect of a specified #yFlask.
The following effect occurs if you have not #yInfused this turn.
Cost is reduced by #b2 whenever you #yInfuse a #yFlask shown on the left of this card. When played, resets the cost of ALL cards with the same name. This card's cost cannot be randomized.
The original cost of an unupgraded copy of a card.
